trans-unit.source: Determines the format of the message.
Literal means that the message is a literal instance of the schema in the WSDL as shown in the following Document/Literal example.
trans-unit.target: Literal significa que a mensagem é uma instância de literal do esquema no WSDL, conforme mostrado no exemplo seguinte documento/Literal.

trans-unit.source: ``` <Add xmlns="http://Microsoft.ServiceModel.Samples"> <n1>100</n1> <n2>15.99</n2> </Add> ``` Encoded means that the schemas in the WSDL are abstract specifications that are encoded according to the rules found in SOAP 1.1 section 5.
trans-unit.target: ``` <Add xmlns="http://Microsoft.ServiceModel.Samples"> <n1>100</n1> <n2>15.99</n2> </Add> ```Codificado significa que os esquemas no WSDL são especificações abstratas que são codificadas, de acordo com as regras encontradas na secção 5 do SOAP 1.1.

trans-unit.source: The following is an RPC/Encoded example.

``` <q1:Add xmlns:q1="http://Microsoft.ServiceModel.Samples"> <n1 xsi:type="xsd:double" xmlns="">100</n1> <n2 xsi:type="xsd:double" xmlns="">15.99</n2> </q1:Add> ``` Use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.XmlSerializerFormatAttribute?displayProperty=fullName> to set this value.
trans-unit.target: ``` <q1:Add xmlns:q1="http://Microsoft.ServiceModel.Samples"> <n1 xsi:type="xsd:double" xmlns="">100</n1> <n2 xsi:type="xsd:double" xmlns="">15.99</n2> </q1:Add> ```Utilize o <xref:System.ServiceModel.XmlSerializerFormatAttribute?displayProperty=fullName>definir este valor.</xref:System.ServiceModel.XmlSerializerFormatAttribute?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Implies that the schemas in the WSDL are abstract specifications that are encoded according to the rules found in SOAP 1.1 section 5.
trans-unit.target: Indica que os esquemas no WSDL são especificações abstratas que são codificadas, de acordo com as regras encontradas na secção 5 do SOAP 1.1.

trans-unit.source: Implies that the message is a literal instance of the schema in the WSDL.
trans-unit.target: Indica que a mensagem é uma instância de literal do esquema no WSDL.
